Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is really only an idea, I often still crosscheck its suggestions which does take longer but also encourages self-driven learning. Feedback from teachers are more reliable and often more specific but can sometimes be a little bit limited due to time constraints.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teacher feedback usually makes me feel better because there is a real person spending time and effort on my work.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI often makes generalization and avoids making specific suggestions whereas a teacher may narrow in on a sentence or line of code.
